Views¶

class projects.views.DataSourceSizeJSONView(**kwargs)¶
get_context_data(**kwargs)¶

Return graph configuration.

get_data()¶

Return 3 datasets to plot.

get_labels()¶

Return 7 labels for the x-axis.

get_providers()¶

Return the list of data series names.

Providers numbers should be equal to series numbers.

class projects.views.DetailView(**kwargs)¶
get_context_data(**kwargs)¶

Insert the single object into the context dict.

model¶

alias of projects.models.Project

class projects.views.LabelLengthJSONView(**kwargs)¶
get_context_data(**kwargs)¶

Return graph configuration.

get_data()¶

get_labels()¶

get_providers()¶

class projects.views.UserProgressJSONView(**kwargs)¶
get_context_data(**kwargs)¶

Return graph configuration.

get_data()¶

Return 3 datasets to plot.

get_labels()¶

Return 7 labels for the x-axis.

get_providers()¶

Return names of datasets.

get_series()¶

Generate HighCharts series from providers and data.

class projects.views.UserTimingJSONView(**kwargs)¶
get_context_data(**kwargs)¶

Return graph configuration.

get_data()¶

Return a list of series [[25, 34, 0, 1, 50], …]).

In the same order as providers and with the same serie length of xAxis.

get_labels()¶

Return 7 labels for the x-axis.

get_providers()¶

Return names of datasets.
